website_summaries.verdict: A simple lip scrub with extra hydration.
pros: A nice, basic lip scrub made from raw sugar cane and a carnauba wax base
Essential oils of orange, vanilla, and cinnamon bark condition lips
Leaves a sweet and spicy scent and flavor
Vegan friendly, cruelty free, and paraben free
cons: Not everyone likes the orange spice scent and flavor

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived in poor packaging AND ALREADY USED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive this item. It smells really nice and based on the overwhelmingly positive reviews, I'm sure it works well... but the product arrived in poor packaging with a big sticker wrapped around the side, and it appeared already half-used!!! There was a huge finger scoop in it and the container was 1/3 empty. Also, the lid was scuffed up and had some kind of residue on it. I'm asking for a refund immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Smells amazing. I bought this because I've recently became a LipSense junkie and have trouble getting that to stay on my lips all day! I use this at night before bed and then gloss over it. I've been doing that everyday for about a week now and I've definitely seen a difference in my lips! Throughout the day I don't ever use chapstick anymore, and two months ago I was constantly attached to a tube of chapstick to keep my lips from cracking. Now they're soft and wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: My Absolute FAVORITE Sugar Lip Scrub ~ Best Value
customer_reviews.text: This is my ABSOLUTE FAVORITE sugar lip scrub out there and I have tried the expensive brands.....this brand works best out of all of them. Plus if you happen to taste it, it is super yummy. Softens your lips and removes dead skin....reveals a super kissable lip and they stay soft for a good couple of days. I like to use this once a day, but some people only use once or twice a week. Amazon sometimes has this on a lightning deal and sometimes you get three for one price (best deal), so look for that often....it's worth it! This stuff is great, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great lip scrub!
customer_reviews.text: This product smells good and works great. My first lip scrub I've ever tried and the only one I'll ever want to use. I've checked out lip scrubs in stores and none of them compares to this. I also love the fact that this product is cruelty free and made with natural ingredients. Definitely leaves my lip soft and supple, which I love to pair with my lip tints.
customer_reviews.author: Sherjer

customer_reviews.title: Dry...Wouldn't Stay on My Lips!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this lip scrub previous to my ordering it on Amazon. The one I have is emollient and somewhat soft, allowing me to apply it to my lips. However, the ones I purchased (there are three and I opened only one) are almost hard, without any wetness to them, so that when I attempt to apply it to my lips, it doesn't adhere. I reiterate, I am not a new user of this product, and I truly feel the ones I have ordered from Amazon are either faulty or old. Disappointingly, these are being returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: The fall cinnamon and orange blend of spices used in this lip scrub is warming and delightful! This scrub is heavy on the scrub so I can only use it once a week now that it's spring. Not as much oil as some of the others. This is a good hardcore scrub for severely chapped lips that smells heavenly!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Marie

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It works great and has a nice taste. It was purchased for my wife who has a lot of allergy problems and after several uses has had no problem at all. It was fresh and has a nice consistency, Amazon got it to her quickly as expected. She is very happy and plans to use your product again. Thank you very much. Jeff and Pym Leith
customer_reviews.author: solid

customer_reviews.title: Smooth lips for the first time in years.
customer_reviews.text: So I've been struggling my whole life with really dry scabby lips. Like if I rub my lips together I will always feel these sharp edges scraping each other. Everyday I have to walk around with a lip balm or something just so people don't see how dry my lips actually are. So I decided to try this product and WOW. I just scrubbed it on my lips and kept it on for 2 minutes and for the first time in years I don't have any scabs or sharpness on my lips. I use this and afterwards I put on "Dr Dan's cortibalm" that I also got on Amazon. Match made in heaven. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisia

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Needs a Tweak
customer_reviews.text: The product works really well and I use it almost every day. My one quibble with it is the packaging: it is a thick, granular putty in a small jar, so when you reach in to get some, you tend to pack it under your fingernail and waste product. I think that the manufacturer should include a little scoop or paddle in order to optimize the use and avoid wasting the scrub.
customer_reviews.author: BooksAndRoses

customer_reviews.title: Lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: Tastes wonderful. I have a major sweet tooth, but the popular vanilla sugar ones are even too much for me and make me gag a bit. This one is still sweet, but more of a cinnamony and citrus flavor. Works well, but I do have trouble keeping it on my lips. I scoop out a glob, rub it on, and after a few seconds there's nothing left on my lips because it all smushed off. I'm guessing that's a user error issue of some sort though.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a lip scrub before so I have no comparison. I bought the orange spice scrub and it work great! I was worried about it irritating my lips and I've had no issue with it. I use it before bed and apply Dr. Lipp's balm afterwards and it helps my lips stay flake free and moisturized all day. I recommend using this if you have dry flaky lips.
customer_reviews.author: Jorden Cheney

customer_reviews.title: very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub is very good quality and I highly recommend it for general lip maintenance and moisturizing. However, the sugar granules are a bit too small for my needs. I have heavy pealing on my lower lip that requires a more aggressive product to remove the dead skin. I use this scrub for my upper lip maintenance and ended up making my own for my lower lip.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Plant based, safe to ingest, and leaves your lips smooth and moisturized!
customer_reviews.text: Exfoliates well and is safe to ingest! I use this lip exfoliator before putting on any lipstick or lipgloss while I get ready, it's gentle enough to not harm my lips and tough enough to get rid of dead skin. It is oil based and leaves your lips feeling a moisturized. However, I don't mind that since my lips are prone to dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmila

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I had a high expectation.... ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I had a high expectation.... I was hoping this would help my lip wrinkles less noticeable but it really doesn't....
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!
customer_reviews.text: um ok... I have only used this once today and it was amazing. I have never used a lip scrub before so maybe it is just normal but I have terribly dry lips and was kind of tired of it so I decided to buy this. It had great reviews and now I know why. It almost immediately made my lips smoother and plumper, after a few swipes. All my crackly grooved lips were gone. I would definitely recommend if you have dry or even freaking normal lips.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Medina

customer_reviews.title: This product is a MUST have for cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: My lips have been terribly chapped. The burning was unbearable & I had tried numerous brands for treatment. I ordered this out of desperation & it is AMAZING. It is gentle, but porous enough to slough away dry skin. It leaves my lips feeling clean & nourished. Also, it only takes a tiny bit for application. This small jar will last a very long time. I apply Jack Black’s intense therapy lip balm afterwards & the pain is gone. Both products are a must have during these cold winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Foley

customer_reviews.title: Expensive? Yes. Worth it? Also yes.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah...this is a "treat yo self" buy, and it is worth it. I've had trouble in the past with lip "scrubs" that barely exfoliate my skin because the sugar crystals are too big and they just seem to make a few scratches on the surface of my lips. Not this product! it is thick and fine, and will last you forever, so that makes it worth the price in my book. I would say it will take about a year to use up all of it, and thats doing a lip scrub maybe once a week using a conservative amount.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Mine is really dry and while it smells good, it's kind of like just rubbing sugar on ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I was expecting this to be more of an exfoliating balm then a scrub. Mine is really dry and while it smells good, it's kind of like just rubbing sugar on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Casie Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product twice a week and it really works. I had very dry lips and I used a lot of products trying to fix my problem, but everything I used made my lips more dry and I couldn't understand, until I used the lip exfoliating with the lip night mask. it worked immediately, I seen a difference after my first night of use.
customer_reviews.author: Edie A. Holyfield

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...I was having serious problems with chapped lips....this was essential in removing dry skin from my lips & moisturizing them as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Love this Scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE everything about this product. I think it night be my favorite beauty product. I have never used a lip scrub before, so I don't know if this one is as exceptional as it seems to me, but it smells great, has a great flavor, and is so effective in exfoliating my lips and making them feel hydrated and smooth. I want to use it every day, but I am afraid that will be overkill, so I am limiting myself to 2 times a week, which means the little pot will last me forever!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie

customer_reviews.title: Instructions needed
customer_reviews.text: I just received and used it once. The product seems to be as described . . . natural, etc. The only issue is that I don't know how long to leave it on for. It came with no instructions. Based on other products of its kind, I left it on for about 3 minutes. Let's see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: F.S.

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best lip scrub I’ve used so far and I’ve used ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best lip scrub I’ve used so far and I’ve used a lot of them. It doesn’t taste that great to me so I wouldn’t lick it off that’s one of my down falls because every other lip scrub I’ve been able to lick it off but overall it’s a good product
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really liking the lip exfoliating scrub. My lips feel and look great! I just started using it, so I only magine what they will look and feel like in time. Great Customer Service too!😀
customer_reviews.author: NAH

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I got thos because my lips were super dry and chapped and I use their lip mask frequently. Unfortunately, it tore up my lips causing bleeding to my lips and around my mouth which I would not expect from an all natural product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Monitor

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: My lips were so dry that I couldn't wear lipstick. It showed every crevice every time I would put color on my lips. My lips looked terrible, especially my bottom lip. I used this scrub ONE TIME and my lips were exfoliated and looked SO Much better. I just rubbed in on, and then I let it sit on my lips for a few minutes. Rinsed them, and my lips looked and felt awesome. I did have to put some lip balm on afterwards, as they were dry. But I love this product! So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I received my lip revival 8/15/17 and I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I received my lip revival 8/15/17 and I LOVE IT!! Never been huge on exfoliating my lips until now! I've used it maybe 3 or 4 times and I'm satisfied with it. My lips have a tendency to chap horribly, no matter how much lip balm, gloss or whatever I use, they are still chapped! I didn't have to use anything after using this product because my lips were kissably soft! Seriously! I was shocked at how soft they were. I will definitely purchase again when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Yes! It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently discovered this lip sugar product & besides working well, I love the lime/ginger "flavor". My lips are always too dry, but this really helps. I'm old so I've found this diminishes those fine lines around my lips. I feel better just telling everyone about this product and am so glad I discovered it.
customer_reviews.author: ShariMc

customer_reviews.title: Best 💜 lip scrub!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Favorite one yet! I have an elf exfoliation stickband a Mary Kay lip exfoliate but this one is soooo much better.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gambardella

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE, WORKS WELL!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin and dry lips from aging, and tried castor oil (at night) to moisturize. Need to exfoliate for best effect, though. I made a DIY version, but this works so much better, I use much less and it is not as messy. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Linda Herner

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way..and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I hope that this container doesn't dry up since you only need so little to do the job and it will last a long time. It really works. I started out doing 3x a week and now I'm down to 2 or 1. Excellent product well worth the money...assuming that it doesn't dry out!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: A decent lip exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent lip scrub. I'm my opinion, having used many lip exfoliants in past, this is comparable to most. It has a thicker, messier consistency than others that makes application a bit of a hassle. This is not a moisturizing product and will need to be followed with a lip moisturizer as it will leave your lips dry.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bojkovsky

customer_reviews.title: Best Exfoliator Experienced
customer_reviews.text: This lip exfoliator works well and is easy to use. Simply apply some to your lips, gently rub with ring finger, and rinse off. Leaves lips soft and smooth. Especially helpful after the dry air of winter has ravaged lips.
customer_reviews.author: Sue of Kalamazoo

customer_reviews.title: Clean, soft exfoliated lips
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoyed this lip scrub! The scent was light and refreshing and it was great for exfoliating my lips. After you rinse it off, there's a waxy residue left on your lips but I believe that's the stuff that makes your lips soft after you've dried them. Just delicately pat your lips dry and it absorbs right into your lips. I've used the entire little tub and must say that it was a great addition to my beauty routine. My lips felt clean supple.
customer_reviews.author: Je.C

customer_reviews.title: VERY usefu product, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! I live in Colorado, just moved from Florida...my lips were drying out very quickly. I got this as a sample in my Allure Beauty Box. I thought it was GREAT! I use it every morning after I get out of the shower and I found it helps keep my lips soft (in addition to using a lip conditioner). I have been so happy with the small sample I received that I bought a full size one from the company recently. I highly recommend it, fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. At first I was worried that the cinnamon bark essential oils would burn due to cinnamon being a natural and quick fix lip plumper but, it doesn't. I am also rather sensitive to synthetic or very fragrant scents and this lip scrub does not bother me; there is just a slight sweet smell because of the vanilla. Overall this is a great product and refreshing when I want to pamper myself a little bit before I start my day. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lip Exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this lip exfoliator. I have been a Bliss user for some time now and was satisfied; however, it is pricey. I decided to try Beauty for Real lip exfoliator and am a convert. There is so much more scrub in this exfoliator which is what I really needed. It is thicker, but works so much better, and the flavor is very nice, also. I will be purchasing this exfoliator from now on.
customer_reviews.author: reb4864

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic dry peeling lips and received this product in my Assure beauty box one month and fell in love. I use this as needed and my lips have never looked or felt better. It also tastes great. I highly recommend it. I even added this item to my subscribe and save order.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle exfoliation!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really effective in creating baby smooth lips! It’s a little gentle so it won’t get rid of all your dead strips on your lips on the first go if your mouth is currently like the Sahara Dessert, but it only took me two to three days of application (once a day, sometimes twice in three days) and some help from regular lip balm (I use Carmex) application to go from totally rough to super smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!  And it smells so yummy
customer_reviews.text: I received my Beauty For Real Lip revival a little over a week ago and I'm in love. I wear a lot of long wear matte lipstick which is tough to remove and can be really drying so finding a product that exfoliates and moisturizes was crucial. This product has a great smell and does a great job of gently exfoliating my lips while keeping them soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Orban

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Saved my lips!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product that I would recommend. I have very dry and cracked lips and different lip moisturizing methods weren't working. I thought that I was just not meant to wear lipstick because it would apply wrong and just not look right on me. After looking up some lip exfoliating products I went with this one. I use it once every 2-3 days. My lips show a complete difference and now lipstick goes on like a dream! I will definitely repurchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I've had dry lips ever since I was in middle school, and anything I tried to remedy it would never alleviate the pain of having chapped, flaking lips. I had never tried exfoliating my lips, but figured I might as well after purchasing every type of lip balm ever invented. It's mild, gentle, and I really enjoy the taste. Personally, I use it every day before bedtime but I recommend starting slow and maybe using it 2-3 times per week. I'm pleasantly surprised with this purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Straight, no chaser.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it promises. It's a nice exfoliator, gentle enough that I use it every night before I wash my face but strong enough that I've noticed a definite improvement on my lips' overall health, particularly in the cold-weather months. It won't replace a good moisturizing regimen, but it will prime your lips for whatever you throw at them. Also: it tastes kinda nice :) There's a slight residue after you wash the actual exfoliating scrub off your lips that tastes just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: keeps my lips soft
customer_reviews.text: This product has kept my lips soft and plump. It has been part of my everyday routine. It only not exfoliates my lips but it also acts as a moisturizer. I use this before I put on my lip tint and it makes a difference because it helps the tint last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Valdez

customer_reviews.title: unsealed makeup
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived in box rolling around with the top unsealed rolling around loose.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: Completely dried out
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was completely dried out, I had to scrape the product out with my nail to use. I'm not sure if I just received a bad batch, or if this is how it is supposed to be?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this! I just received it today and used it tonight for the first time and I'm so pleased with everything about it! It made my lips look so plump and radiant. I get really chapped lips and this exfoliated all of the dry skin away and made them baby smooth. Will definitely buy more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Scrub!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to my shower routine; smells and tastes delicious!
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my chapped lips at bay
customer_reviews.text: This product, if used on a regular basis, does help keep my lips from being chapped. The taste and smell are pretty neutral but the product leaves my lips without flakes and well moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: dalynn3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: BOXYCHARM had this and I was bummed I didn't get one in my box so I went ahead and purchased it. Works great and tastes good too!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Leaves lips soft and hydrated
customer_reviews.text: After trying several similar products I'm ready to make Lip Revival my go-to lip product! Its easy to use and leaves your lips feeling soft and hydrated without being "sticky". And, after use your lipstick glides on smoothly. Plus, it taste good to!
customer_reviews.author: Donna OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful! The flavor is very mild and the consistency ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! The flavor is very mild and the consistency is creamy enough to get out easy, but dense enough that I feel like it's working. Packaging is fairly hassle free. I got this to battle scratchy lips this winter. I'm using much less than I would have guessed I needed to accomplish smooth lips. It came in a small, non obtrusive box and the lid easily screws on/off. I feel like it's appropriately priced for the amount/quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mutsima

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product! I have been looking for a good non-drying out scrub for my lips, especially for the cold and dry winters we get here in Colorado. Not only does it smell great but it feels like it is doing its job of taking off the dry skin and leaving your lips super soft and moisturized and overall revitalized . I am overly satisfied with this lip scrub and looking forward to trying out other product by this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I personally loved this scrub so much. For Christmas I always give my favorite item(s) of the year to all of my closest female family & friends. This scrub (along with my favorite lip conditioner) was my trademark Christmas present for 2018. Who knows what I will find next on Amazon that will be my signature gift for 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Troop

customer_reviews.title: Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Miraculous for me. Literally my whole life (I'm 53) problem with cracking dry lips and every product tried and failed, including other scrubs. I got a sample of this in my Allure beauty box and it has fixed my lips! I use it every morning in the shower, any lipstick. I usually use some sort of lip balm throughout the day, right now Grande Lips, and they stay smooth and nice. Game changer, I right away ordered 2 full size. If you have this problem get it now!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Adams

customer_reviews.title: Be carful not to EAT it!!! Lol!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not meant to moisturize! I think it does a ok job at removing dead skin cells! BUT I can’t stop licking it off! It’s so tasty! Lol!!! I got the orange flavored one. Use it everyday then apply chapstick and our lips will improve!
customer_reviews.author: Packergirl42092

customer_reviews.title: This product a little greasy for my liking but smells excellent and works really well at lips exfoliation and hydration
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small jar of exfoliating product. This product a little greasy for my liking but smells excellent and works really well at lips exfoliation and hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub works wonders for me since I wear lipstick a lot and endure Minnesota winters. The cinnamon and orange flavor is intoxicating, my lips feel renewed and moist after each time I use it :) It's a little luxury that I do not regret splurging on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip scrub! It really works; leaves my lips so soft. My lips are always chapped and this stuff does the trick. I have used other scrubs before and this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help me
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help exfoliate my very dry lips. It doesn't seem to help. Maybe this is for maintenance and I need something more intense.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: so this was my first experience with such a product- and I love it: ) leaves my lips feeling soft&
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a lip scrub before, so this was my first experience with such a product- and I love it :) leaves my lips feeling soft& supple
customer_reviews.author: Charli Bones

customer_reviews.title: Nice Treat for the Lips
customer_reviews.text: I use this to exfoliate my lips which get dry and flaky on occasion. The cream is yummy tasting and smooths and plumps my lips up. I'd recommend this product. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R. Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few months now and I love it. It's not like other scrubs that seem to melt away so quick that you don't get to scrub. This one stays so thay you can scrub all the dead skin off. Leaves my lips so smooth! Definitely will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Jdhsisks
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good and tastes exactly how it smells BUT THEY DONT FILL IT UP ALL THEY WAY sad :/
customer_reviews.author: Hot Mom

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I lived without it for so long!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing lip exfoliator. It smells (and tastes!) great. My lips feel soft for days after using it and I don't feel the need to apply lip balm on days I've used it. Everyone I've introduced to it loves it - men included. This will be my new go to gift when I need a little something!
customer_reviews.author: SouthernHB

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub! It’s got a nice scent and doesn’t taste bad when it gets in your mouth. My lips look great and it does it’s job removing dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: Zythna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. My lips were so dry and cracked I think from the weather but after using this once made such a HUGE difference. And it has a good taste. You're gonna get it into ur mouth no matter how hard u try not to. I dont recommend licking it off though. I use a paper towel to get it off and then rince with water. My lips haven't felt this soft in such a long time. Even though the bottle is tiny, u only need the smallest amout. This is going to last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell like vanilla and feels like coating lips with sugar
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great scrub! Match it with a lip night mask and it’s perfect! My lips feel amazing!
customer_reviews.author: massiel checo

customer_reviews.title: No more lip peeling!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. My lips are terribly chapped year round but especially in the winter months. I drink a substantial amount of water daily. I used a lip moisturizer at night and this scrub first thing in the morning. I follow with a moisturizing lip balm or gloss. All the dead skin is gone and I can wear matte lipstick now (no more zombie lips!!!).
customer_reviews.author: Books R Water

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and only takes a minute to get rid of the dry skin on my chapped lips. Only have to use a tiny bit each time. My lips feel wonderful afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Horn

customer_reviews.title: Really like it but way expensive for the size.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the size of the box that came for it. My hands are kinda small and it was even small in my hands. But the product is great. Smells really nice, great ingredients and smooth application. I've only used it once but the morning after I used it, lips were smooth like butter. My main gripe is the price for the size that you get. Other than that, if you have some money to splurge and want a great lip exfoliation scrub with great ingredients I would definitely recommend this product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: JGH

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this product but unfortunately I don't think it helped ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product but unfortunately I don't think it helped me. Item came dirty looking almost like it had been used. No directions or paper instructions included in the box. Pretty disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my dry chapped lips!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with dry chapped lips for the majority of the winter, after just a week of using this product I have seen an overall drastic improvement. I don't feel so self conscious about their appearance anymore. I only wish I found this product earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work immediately and has my lips feeling amazing and hydrated again
customer_reviews.text: Very little goes along way! Work immediately and has my lips feeling amazing and hydrated again. Has a soft scent, not overwhelming and is sweet.
customer_reviews.author: M_Kis

customer_reviews.title: Just Sugar...
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't stick together at all so it makes a mess and I can barely use it to scrub because it falls off my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Soft Plump BIG Lips!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - my lips definitely get much larger after the product has been applied which is pleasantly surprising! I have been using the product for a week or so and I don't have any complaints. Although the product amount is very small, it will go a long way. Love how moisturized my lips are once the product has been applied. Would definitely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Marchelle

customer_reviews.title: Use this every day!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had purchased a MUCH more expensive product to this from Nordstrom previously and although I liked that one too, this one does the job just as well. I use it every morning prior to leaving the house and a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub is great! I’m going to go use more ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lavy

customer_reviews.title: I'm never disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves this. She applies this before taking a shower. Lets it settle for 5-10 minutes then washes at the end of her shower. She comes out and gives be a big ol' kiss. I'm never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBossLady

customer_reviews.title: It’s so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing!!!! This orange spice totally reminds me of the holidays but not overly strong!! This is hands down the best lip scrub in my opinion! I am so glad I have found this!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic! I'm trying to break my habit of chewing ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! I'm trying to break my habit of chewing on my lip and this has helped so much. Smooths them out and moisturizes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Live it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Only thing that has ever helped my very dry lips. Makes them smooth and look plump!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting smooth lips with no dead skin
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money for me because its such a fine textured exfoliant. Yes you can make your own at home with brown sugar and some oil, but the sugar is much coarser and doesn't exfoliate the lips as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced granulated sugar
customer_reviews.text: It’s literally flavoured sugar with Vaseline or coconut oil. It’s hard to apply as sugar won't stick to your lips, can’t stay on and absolutely does nothing to moisten or exfoliate your lips. It’s overpriced granulated sugar with oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't have chapped lips, but this past month was all about chapped lips. They were rough, peeling (I wasn't helping the cause by pulling the skin off), and chapstick wasnt cutting it. Found this on Amazon and gave it a shot. I swear, it seemed like an overnight miracle. My lips were smoother and no longer chapped. I use this just about every night now. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love the fragrance and taste of this lip scrub. So far it has really helped soften my lips which I really needed as I just had major oral surgery. Will definitely but again.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: This actually left my lips drier than before using the product. Wanted to love it, but unfortunately, did not work well for my skin (lip) type. Might work well for others...
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and this seller
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and this seller. I got my product quick. This scrub removes all the dry skin from harsh weather and makes the lips feel soft and look renewed. The product taste good, too. I will be ordering again.

customer_reviews.title: I did not care for this at all. It ...

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Lips feel great after application and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Lips feel great after application and it tastes really good too! I would definitely recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Not as exfoliating as I thought it would be; ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as exfoliating as I thought it would be; removes very little dead skin. If you want instant and short gratification, then this will do. My lips were soft for about a few minutes and I found that I definitely needed a lip balm right after.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Tastes amazing (don't start snacking on it or something weird though) and leaves my lips so soft!

customer_reviews.title: Great lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: Very good lip scrub. I sometimes have chapped dry lips and this lip scrub always helps. I love putting this on. And it also smells great. Nothing too overwhelming, and it’s Never irritated my lips. My lips feel really soft and hydrated afterwards. Will buy again. And would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, i suffer from cracked lips often and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, i suffer from cracked lips often and i have attempted to make home remedies but i don't have thay kind of time. This active makes my lips super soft and it smells and taste good. Will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this leaves my lips soft and smooth. I leave it on for a few minutes and then use a wet washcloth to scrub it in and wipe it off. I usually apply lip balm all day and I've noticed when I use this, I'm not applying nearly as much. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: Just what my lips needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it has cured my winter lips not to mention the scent is just right. I decided to purchase even after all the "it's too hard to get product out" reviews and really it's not that hard and it you feel you have big fingers just use a q-tip. I would buy again.

customer_reviews.text: Didn't really do much for me if, anything just irritated my lips from having to rub the beads in resulting in redness/dryness. Wouldn't purchase this again.

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, great product. Makes my lips very soft and gets rid of the dead skin.

product_meta.title: Beauty For Real Lip Revival Sugar Lip Scrub, Orange Spice, Unisex Exfoliating Conditioning Lip Treatment, Essential Oils, Vegan, Organic, Cruelty Free 0.5 oz
feature_bullets: [Younger Lips] Lips look visibly younger and plumper after one treatment. Raw organic sugar exfoliates while natural Carnauba wax and coconut oils hydrate and condition lips.

[100% Natural] Conditioning sugar lip scrub provides relief from dry, chapped and matte color stained lips with the most effective, natural vegan ingredients including plant oils and organic raw sugar.
[Easy To Apply] Apply a pea-sized amount of sugar lip scrub with your ring finger, gently rub in circular motion for 15-30 seconds. Remove with a tissue.

[Cruelty-Free] This product is cruelty-free and is not made with or tested on animals of any kind. This product contains organic ingredients. This product is also paraben-free. Parabens can cause skin irritation in individuals with paraben allergies.

[100% Happy Guarantee] At Beauty For Real, nothing matters more than happy customers. With our Happy Customer Guarantee, you can be sure of a great buying experience or your money back. Please contact Customer Service in case of any order-related issues.
